entry.summary: since2021: Subject: Heroku Security Update: OAuth token revoked At 5:00 p.m. PT on April 16, 2022, Salesforce completed the revocation of all OAuth tokens from the Heroku Dashboard GitHub integration. As mentioned previously, this will prevent you from deploying your apps from GitHub through the Heroku dashboard or via Heroku automation, and some other actions in the dashboard will no longer work. While you will be unable to reconnect to GitHub via the Heroku dashboard, you may continue to use other code deployment methods available in the following documentation: Integrating with Version Control Providers Besides GitHub Deploying with Git Â•áÂ•áÊÄ™ÊÄ™ÁöÑÔΩû
